overview: Serving as the Chief Operations Officer of a prominent web development/political consulting firm in Columbia, S.C., Michael has experience building and managing Internet projects and political campaigns. As part of a team, he worked extensively on developing and operating Win With WordPress (a WordPress app for political campaigns), Fundraiser 7 (an event ticketing app on Piryx), and Share Our Campaign (a Facebook app). His previous work includes developing Citizen Hill for almost two years, beta testing an existing product and successfully gaining high-level political connections.
